summary.body: Hi  Does anyone know how to whiten these original Barbican bathtubs.  I am poised to sell/rent my flat and would like a whiter bathtub to be part of the picture. I once had a cleaner from Abracadabra or somewhere come in and they told me something about soaking the tub overnight with bio or non-bio washing powder - dissolved in cold water.  Does anyone know this or any other tricks? Thanks very much, Jeannie
summary.subject: A whiter bathtub

summary.body: Anyone know where I can get plastic sheeting large enough to wrap a king sized mattress in?
summary.subject: plastic sheeting

summary.body: On the standard electric CredaPlan barbican oven, could some-one help me translate the numbers on the dial so I can cook my ovenready meals safely? The Oven dial runs from 0 to 5 ..... Now are those the same as 'gasmarks' referred to on ready meals?  - clearly not Centigrade or Fahrenheit. Any enlightenment would be appreciated, many thanks,
summary.subject: Settings on CredaPlan Oven

summary.body: Has anybody used Abracadabra or Helping Hands for cleaning (or anything else)? If so, a report would be most welcome. Thanks
summary.subject: cleaner report

summary.body: Has anybody tried to wall mount a plasma screen and channel out for the wiring, and if so how successful was it?
